channel.title: A couple questions needing answers
channel.description:
1.) How do you change the starting location, starting items, starting skills... starting everything for a new person on my server?
2.) How do you change the default look of your character (i.e. hair, shirt, etc.)? Can anyone give me codes?
3.) How can I edit how much XP people get when they attack something, smelt, fletch, etc.?
I need help lol

item.title: A couple questions needing answers
item.dc:creator: @Fun_4_me_not_u Fun 4 me not u
item.description:
@Fun_4_me_not_u wrote:

  1. Goto player.java and edit their starting points
  2. Goto player.java and edit their starting look.
  3. IDK, look where your skills are and change the xp per action.

You should find somthing like this for player starting look:

// Giving the player a unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=2910; playerEquipment[playerCape]=4405; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=2906; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2495; playerEquipment[playerHands]=2912; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=2904; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4587;

Read full topic
